definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to abstain from voting/to forfeit/to waive one's right to vote/to abdicate
to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom)/all that has been achieved goes down the drain
to abandon oneself to despair/to give up and stop bothering

sentences.english: The shovel is the one tool that Davis and his fellow principal investigators do not use.
sentences.chinese: 铲子是戴维斯和他的主要调查者弃之不用的工具。

sentences.english: In the wake of the scandal, the senator's one-time adherents quietly deserted him.
sentences.chinese: 因为丑闻，该参议院昔日的追随者悄然弃他而去。

sentences.english: In the Old Testament, the son of Abraham who was cast out after the birth of Isaac.
sentences.chinese: 以实玛利旧约中亚伯拉罕之子，在以撒出生后被弃。

sentences.english: When you play Phantasmagorian, any player may discard three cards. If a player does, counter Phantasmagorian.
sentences.chinese: 当你使用惊怖幻象时，任意玩家可以弃三张牌。

sentences.english: I have been young, and now am old;
sentences.chinese: 我从前年幼，现在年老，却未见过义人被弃。

sentences.english: The only time you run out of chances is when you stop taking them.
sentences.chinese: 当你停止捕捉机会时，机会弃你而去。

sentences.english: That depended, Mr Hill said, on North Korea's future efforts towards denuclearisation.
sentences.chinese: 希尔说，那取决于朝鲜未来在弃核方向上的努力。

sentences.english: Why is Mr Obama abandoning one of his central election pledges?
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马何以弃竞选时的重要承诺于不顾？

sentences.english: But then they dwindled and were humbled through oppression, sorrow and distress.
sentences.chinese: 其后因惨遭灾患苦难，人口减少而被弃如前。

sentences.english: The site also reports that her lawyers have officially dropped her as a client.
sentences.chinese: 消息网还报道说她的律师已经弃她而去。

sentences.english: Give up little minds of swallows, and hold high aspirations of swans .
sentences.chinese: 弃燕雀之小志，慕鸿鹄而高翔。

sentences.english: The car was discovered abandoned two hours later by police, Perez said.
sentences.chinese: 两小时后，警方发现这辆凌志车被弃在路边。

sentences.english: The snake then slithered into the nest.
Even the disciples forsook him and fled .
sentences.chinese: 甚至连他的门徒也弃他而去。

sentences.english: If you don't love the cause, you'll end up disengaged.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不喜欢这项事业，你会最终弃之而去。

sentences.english: L is taken as a plant available to live in abandoned land in arid region.
sentences.chinese: 黄花蒿可作为干旱地区收复弃耕地的先锋植物。

definition: to give up/to abandon/to give alms
to throw down/to dump/to abandon/thrown down
to be willing to/to resign oneself to
chaff, husks, distillers' dregs etc (food eaten by the poor)/(fig.) rubbish/junk/(abbr. for 糟糠妻[zao1 kang1 qi1]) wife who goes through the hardships of poverty with her husband
willingness/would rather (agree to X than Y)
